meanings.definition: A bathroom connected to a bedroom.
meanings.sent1: The hotel room had ensuites for each guest.
meanings.sent2: The luxury suite had ensuites for added convenience.
meanings.sent3: The ensuites were so close, you could brush your teeth in bed!
meanings.sent4: The ensuites whispered tales of late-night showers and early morning routines.
meanings.sent5: The ensuites gleamed with the promise of privacy and comfort.

meanings.sent3: The ensuites were like secret hideaways for relaxation.
meanings.sent4: The ensuites held the echoes of peaceful moments and refreshing showers.
meanings.sent5: The ensuites beckoned with the allure of personal space and tranquility.
